comment: The characteristic polynomial of a (square) matrix over a commutative ring is a polynomial, see also the following remark in [Lang], p. 561: "[the characteristic polynomial] is an element of k[[t]". (Contributed by AV, 2-Aug-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 29-Nov-2019.)
